item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:14, topic:371316”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=467403.msg3417984#msg3417984 date=1291258635]
why would you get 2 def!!! drives me crazy hahahaha
[/quote]

Because the fucking idiot who was paying for my account go tricked into using a butterfly nest for a “youtube video” and didn’t look to see it was controlled.[/quote]
damn that sux bro :[

item.title: What should I do with this pure account?
item.dc:creator: @teufel teufel
item.description:
@teufel wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:11, topic:371316”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=467403.msg3417950#msg3417950 date=1291256993]

I’ve quit, as I found RS was a waste of time

Doubt you’ll be training it…

Anyway; you’d only get about $10-20 on the account. $30 at most.

I don’t think so, with 85 mining/84 fishing/82 mage and the quests is atleast 30.

~$20 at most. You obviously haven’t seen the RS market nowadays. Those stats would take ~1 week to bot.

Thats a complete lie. It took 2 months. With paid bots. 85 mining is legit. It still takes forever.
[/quote]
GL selling it then.[/quote]

I said I’d buy it…

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with this pure account?

item.title: What should I do with this pure account?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]If you aren’t giving it away for free, we can’t suggest much.

You only option is selling/trading, none of which can be done on this site.[/quote]

Prices, what could I get… Where to sell…?

Or, train it up to a main, ect…?

Just think.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with this pure account?

item.title: What should I do with this pure account?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Have a ‘raffle’ type thing, in this topic.

Think of a certain number, and message a mod as a record, so they can prove it, then let people post, and who ever posts on that certain post, wins it.[/quote][quote=“jmood128, post:3, topic:371316”]I would be more then kind enough to take the account off your hands for free?[/quote]

I’m open to suggestion, but as I stated, I won’t be giving the account away for free.

Read full topic
